commit.message:
configure.in: add i370-*-openedition, i370-*-mvs and i370-*-linux targets

        * configure.in: add i370-*-openedition, i370-*-mvs and
        i370-*-linux targets

From-SVN: r29191

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+Tue Sep  7 23:36:59 1999  Linas Vepstas  <linas@linas.org>
+
+	* configure.in: add i370-*-openedition, i370-*-mvs and
+	i370-*-linux targets
+
 Tue Sep  7 23:31:53 1999  Mark Mitchell  <mark@codesourcery.com>
 
 	* dsp16xxx.c: Include ggc.h

@@ -88,6 +88,7 @@ program_suffix=NONE
 program_transform_name=s,x,x,
 silent=

@@ -202,6 +203,7 @@ Configuration:
   --help                  print this message
   --no-create             do not create output files
   --quiet, --silent       do not print \`checking...' messages
+  --site-file=FILE        use FILE as the site file
   --version               print the version of autoconf that created configure
 Directory and file names:
   --prefix=PREFIX         install architecture-independent files in PREFIX
@@ -372,6 +374,11 @@ EOF
   -site=* | --site=* | --sit=*)
     site="$ac_optarg" ;;
 
+  -site-file | --site-file | --site-fil | --site-fi | --site-f)
+    ac_prev=sitefile ;;
+  -site-file=* | --site-file=* | --site-fil=* | --site-fi=* | --site-f=*)
+    sitefile="$ac_optarg" ;;
+
   -srcdir | --srcdir | --srcdi | --srcd | --src | --sr)
     ac_prev=srcdir ;;
   -srcdir=* | --srcdir=* | --srcdi=* | --srcd=* | --src=* | --sr=*)
@@ -537,12 +544,16 @@ fi
 srcdir=`echo "${srcdir}" | sed 's%\([^/]\)/*$%\1%'`
 
 # Prefer explicitly selected file to automatically selected ones.
-if test -z "$CONFIG_SITE"; then
-  if test "x$prefix" != xNONE; then
-    CONFIG_SITE="$prefix/share/config.site $prefix/etc/config.site"
-  else
-    CONFIG_SITE="$ac_default_prefix/share/config.site $ac_default_prefix/etc/config.site"
+if test -z "$sitefile"; then
+  if test -z "$CONFIG_SITE"; then
+    if test "x$prefix" != xNONE; then
+      CONFIG_SITE="$prefix/share/config.site $prefix/etc/config.site"
+    else
+      CONFIG_SITE="$ac_default_prefix/share/config.site $ac_default_prefix/etc/config.site"
+    fi
   fi
+else
+  CONFIG_SITE="$sitefile"
 fi
 for ac_site_file in $CONFIG_SITE; do
   if test -r "$ac_site_file"; then
@@ -597,7 +608,7 @@ copy=cp
 # - two terminals occur directly after each other
 # - the path contains an element with a dot in it

-echo "configure:601: checking LIBRARY_PATH variable" >&5
+echo "configure:612: checking LIBRARY_PATH variable" >&5

     library_path_setting="contains current directory"

+echo "configure:999: checking build system type" >&5
